hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util

Class CurrentThreadScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util.CurrentThreadScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scheduler

    public class CurrentThreadScheduler
extends Object
implements Scheduler
    Scheduler which runs tasks on the current thread. Timed or repeated tasks may block operations indefinitely.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.02.07.

      • schedule

        public Closeable schedule(Runnable run,
                 long initialDelay,
                 long betweenDelay,
                 TimeUnit unit)
        Description copied from interface: Scheduler
        Schedule a repeaded execution of the given task with the given initialDelay (in nanoseconds) and betweenDelay (in nanoseconds). The expected semantics from the scheduler is to run the task at a fixed rate (i.e., ExecutorService.scheduleAtFixedRate()). Note: Implementations might not have the capability to schedule nanosecond resolution.
        Specified by:
        schedule in interface Scheduler
        Parameters:
        run - the task to run
        initialDelay - the initial delay before the first run
        betweenDelay - the delay between task runs after the
        unit - the delay time unit
        Returns:
        the cancel handler
